TopicTitle: Why wan't I get in this seat ?

Articles.Content:
I fail to get the "Board" option.

What so I so wrong ? I hope I can get it, this is my return vehicle from Eve orbit...

![1b0751b0-57cf-4037-a36e-6ab065eade46.jpg](http://tof.canardpc.com/view/1b0751b0-57cf-4037-a36e-6ab065eade46.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-28T20:14:06Z" title="07/28/2015 08:14  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 28, 2015</time> by Warzouz**
Hard to tell from that perspective, but maybe you're not close enough? Are you right-clicking on the seat?

OK, I didn't know I had to right click on th chair.. I thought the option would pop up as a regular airlock.

It works. Thx!
